abstract: MLB Roundup; Detroit Tigers acquire right-handed pitcher Francisco Rodriguez from Milwaukee Brewers; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Detroit added Francisco Rodriguez, who holds the major league record for saves in a season, to shore up a bullpen that has been a problem for the last few seasons.

headline.main: In Pursuit of Bullpen Stability, Tigers Acquire Francisco Rodriguez
headline.print_headline: Brewers Send Their Closer to the Tigers

snippet: Detroit added Francisco Rodriguez, who holds the major league record for saves in a season, to shore up a bullpen that has been a problem for the last few seasons.
